    Problem Code: EPI01
                                         */
#include <iostream>
#include <bitset>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T=0;
    cin >> T;
    bitset<14> a(T);
    int count=0;
    
    for(int i=0;i<14;i++)
     if(a[i] == 1)
      count++;
    
    cout << count << endl;
    
    return 0;
    }
